body:
Stats for the curious.

* The most-blocked account is a well known troll, blocked by 223 different users. I won't give them credit here, because feeding the trolls and all that.

* The most-blocking account is a user who has blocked 175 people.

* The average Ruqqueteer has blocked 0.95 people.

Stats for the curious.

  • The most-blocked account is a well known troll, blocked by 223 different users. I won't give them credit here, because feeding the trolls and all that.

  • The most-blocking account is a user who has blocked 175 people.

  • The average Ruqqueteer has blocked 0.95 people.

post.title: How many people have blocked you on Ruqqus?

body:
In most cases it won't matter, but a lot of people argue in comments to effectively preach to the crowd. The current block feature allows a malicious user to boldly lie while the target cannot respond, but nobody else knows that this is the case.

It's the same kind of problem that Reddit has with moderators being able to silently remove or kill discussion without anyone knowing.
body_html:
In most cases it won't matter, but a lot of people argue in comments to effectively preach to the crowd. The current block feature allows a malicious user to boldly lie while the target cannot respond, but nobody else knows that this is the case.

It's the same kind of problem that Reddit has with moderators being able to silently remove or kill discussion without anyone knowing.

post.title: How many people have blocked you on Ruqqus?

body: Thats what I have experienced - they just dont want to read your response to a moronic post.
body_html: Thats what I have experienced - they just dont want to read your response to a moronic post.

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

parent.body: Are people still unable to reply to users who blocked them? I've repeatedly seen this being used to 'end' an argument with them having the final say, and it's really not right.
parent.body_html: Are people still unable to reply to users who blocked them? I've repeatedly seen this being used to 'end' an argument with them having the final say, and it's really not right.

post.title: How many people have blocked you on Ruqqus?

body: True, but when someone takes the time to write a response, most are looking for feed back, I know I am.  It doesnt have to be an attack but often I learn something. Thats the point of it. Ive got some good data sources (links) from responses that are not necessarily along my post line of thought.
body_html: True, but when someone takes the time to write a response, most are looking for feed back, I know I am. It doesnt have to be an attack but often I learn something. Thats the point of it. Ive got some good data sources (links) from responses that are not necessarily along my post line of thought.

post.title: How many people have blocked you on Ruqqus?

body: I have blocked 143 accounts, and 165 Guilds. One hell of a lot more than I expected to. Ruqqus has a real Voatster problem. I don't especially care that they're here, and I don't want them censored. But to the extent that these accounts and Guilds keep showing up in Home, All, and Trending, I strongly believe that this will keep Ruqqus from growing. It's a tricky issue, but life is full of tricky issues. Keeping this crap off of the greeting pages isn't censorship to me. I have no idea how many accounts have blocked mine, and am only mildly curious.
body_html: I have blocked 143 accounts, and 165 Guilds. One hell of a lot more than I expected to. Ruqqus has a real Voatster problem. I don't especially care that they're here, and I don't want them censored. But to the extent that these accounts and Guilds keep showing up in Home, All, and Trending, I strongly believe that this will keep Ruqqus from growing. It's a tricky issue, but life is full of tricky issues. Keeping this crap off of the greeting pages isn't censorship to me. I have no idea how many accounts have blocked mine, and am only mildly curious.

parent.body:
Stats for the curious.

* The most-blocked account is a well known troll, blocked by 223 different users. I won't give them credit here, because feeding the trolls and all that.

* The most-blocking account is a user who has blocked 175 people.

* The average Ruqqueteer has blocked 0.95 people.
parent.body_html:
Stats for the curious.

  • The most-blocked account is a well known troll, blocked by 223 different users. I won't give them credit here, because feeding the trolls and all that.

  • The most-blocking account is a user who has blocked 175 people.

  • The average Ruqqueteer has blocked 0.95 people.

post.title: How many people have blocked you on Ruqqus?

author.bio:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:
I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

body:
At least 1. @citwrong (formerly @citronboy) blocked me after I made [several](https://ruqqus.com/+trans/post/53b9/trans-is-under-new-management/hr44) comments [requesting](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/57b5/thank-you-for-banning-klenvastergan/i2l3) to be [banned](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/57b7/i-dislike-klenvastergan/i2jm) from +trans (and citwrong still hasn't banned me yet). Now I can't see posts like "[The only people who care about free speech are the ones who want to abuse it](https://ruqqus.com/+trans/post/576m/the-only-people-who-care-about)" and have to deal with seeing "[This user has blocked you]" all the time, which is as annoying as everyone else says it is.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
At least 1. @citwrong (formerly @citronboy) blocked me after I made several comments requesting to be banned from +trans (and citwrong still hasn't banned me yet). Now I can't see posts like "The only people who care about free speech are the ones who want to abuse it" and have to deal with seeing "[This user has blocked you]" all the time, which is as annoying as everyone else says it is.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]
